Drivers.name: Max Verstappen
Drivers.comment: Simply the best.

Drivers.name: Sergio Perez
Drivers.comment: Veteran and Mexican motorsport hero.

Drivers.name: Charles Leclerc
Drivers.comment: A true championship contender.

Drivers.name: Carlos Sainz
Drivers.comment: One of the top drivers on the grid entering his prime, known as the Smooth Operator for a reason.

Drivers.name: Lando Norris
Drivers.comment: McLaren's young top driver looking to break into the top of the field.

Drivers.name: Oscar Piastri
Drivers.comment: Sophomore driver looking to prove he belongs at the top after a successful first year.

Drivers.name: George Russell
Drivers.comment: A proven technical driver that shouldnt be counted out of any race.

Drivers.name: Fernando Alonso
Drivers.comment: Alonso has discoveered the fountain of youth and can hang with the best in F1

Drivers.name: Lewis Hamilton
Drivers.comment: 7-world championships later and Hamilton still has the same killer instinct. The GOAT.

Drivers.name: Lance Stroll
Drivers.comment: Can deliver a stellar performance given the right conditions, but very inconsistent.

Drivers.name: Yuki Tsunoda
Drivers.comment: He's proven he belongs, now hes shooting for spot on a top team while constantly out performing drivers with superior cars.

Drivers.name: Nico Hulkenberg
Drivers.comment: Sophomore driver looking to prove he belongs at the top after a successful first year.

Drivers.name: Kevin Magnussen
Drivers.comment: They call him The Viking for a reason. A ferocious driver with zero fear.

Drivers.name: Alexander Albon
Drivers.comment: He's got the lead role he wants, now is looking to build success with a historic team.

Drivers.name: Zhou Guanyu
Drivers.comment: Has untapped potential that has yet to be put on display.

Drivers.name: Daniel Ricciardo
Drivers.comment: After a strong start to his career Ricciardo is looking to get things back on track after a few down years.

Drivers.name: Esteban Ocon
Drivers.comment: Has beat the odds at every level and now looks to continue his underdog story.

Drivers.name: Pierre Gasly
Drivers.comment: A product of the Red Bull youth circuit who recently secured a expanded role looks to continue his career progression.

Drivers.name: Valtteri Bottas
Drivers.comment: As a former top driver, Bottas brings a veteran presence that should not be overlooked.

Drivers.name: Logan Sargeant
Drivers.comment: As a rookie last year, Sargeant had struggles but showed flashes of potential.
